stimulusHtml: Hide paintings such as those produced by Cotsiogo (Cadzi Cody) in the late 1800s were important to Shoshone artists in part because of the response the hide paintings got from
choicesHtml: Euro-American tourists, who were eager to buy them
national museums, which sought them for growing collections
other Shoshone, who wore them during ceremonies
tribal leaders, who wanted them for recording events
